And one more.

On Mon, Apr 6, 2020 at 5:59 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
fixing some more errors.

On Mon, Apr 6, 2020 at 5:48 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
Made changes in code to handle multiple addresses in to, cc, bcc fields.

On Mon, Apr 6, 2020 at 4:48 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
fixing errors

Trying to parse multiple to address fields.


On Mon, Apr 6, 2020 at 4:15 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
Testing how data comes into API if there are multiple email addresses.

On Sun, Apr 5, 2020 at 8:34 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
Converting headers to JSON and parsing. Trying to get more info from the email.

On Sun, Apr 5, 2020 at 5:25 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
Some changes in functions

On Sun, Apr 5, 2020 at 5:11 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
Seems to be working. Was able to get bcc email through JSON parse of envelope data. Now checking other functions.

And one more.

data.value:
Hi Anwin,

Hope things are alright with you. We haven't been able to get in touch with you after the awesome demo we had on the 4th. 

Is this not a priority for you? If it is still a top priority maybe you could depute someone to move this forward? 

As always, PB is committed to your success!

Catch you soon,
Anwin
+91-00000-00000

Hi Anwin,

Hope things are alright with you. We haven't been able to get in touch with
you after the awesome demo we had on the 4th.

Is this not a priority for you? If it is still a top priority maybe you
could depute someone to move this forward?

As always, PB is committed to your success!

Catch you soon,
Anwin
+91-00000-00000

data.value:
Since I haven't heard back from you we are closing your file for now. Will it be alright to get in touch with you in a couple of weeks?


On Wed, Apr 8, 2020 at 3:42 PM Anwin Joselyn <anwin@myplaybook.in> wrote:
Hi Anwin,

Hope things are alright with you. We haven't been able to get in touch with you after the awesome demo we had on the 4th. 

Is this not a priority for you? If it is still a top priority maybe you could depute someone to move this forward? 

As always, PB is committed to your success!

Catch you soon,
Anwin
+91-00000-00000

Since I haven't heard back from you we are closing your file for now. Will
it be alright to get in touch with you in a couple of weeks?

data.value:
Dear Anwin,

We all feel the pinch due to this pandemic. Since we understand and being in the same boat please take advantage of our 3 months payment waiver.

Note: No payments required from April - June. Stay safe and sane!
Anwin
